channel.title: Need help with JarMaker
channel.description: Hello, I downloaded JarMaker and I really don't know how to use it and havent found a decent guide. I'm trying to Jar my client so it will make it harder for people to leech, and make it more professional looking. Can someone give me a thorough explanation of how to Jar a client please?

item.title: Need help with JarMaker
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

pus:

Just hide the files except for Run.bat

Most people have their computers enabled to show hidden files, so this doesn’t really help. I suggest using Ric914’s webclient tutorial. It provides a really good way to jar your client, and it will also provide you with a webclient base.

Also, don’t double post.

Read full topic

item.description:
